ovdesc.p: This application allows a user to compare the holdings of all portfolios of a particular Account Officer linked to a particular portfolio model (or group of portfolio models) against their associated portfolio models, highlighting any difference that may occur.

Data can be input into the SC.GROUP.COMPARE record using the Input or Verify functions. If the Verify function is used the record will produce an enquiry (Using one of the ENQUIRY records SC.GROUP.COMPARE.ASET, SC.GROUP.COMPARE.COUNTRY, SC.GROUP.COMPARE.GEOGRAPHIC, SC.GROUP.COMPARE.SECURITY depending on the value of the DETAIL.lEVEL field) showing all the portfolios holdings against their associated models. If this application is being run under GUI then this enquiry can be produced by typing YES in the RUN.ENQUIRY field, if it is being run under classic T24 then the Enquiry will be produced on pressing F5.
Note; The Enquiry will only be produced if SC.GROUP.COMPARE is being run with the Verify Fucntion.

If any of the portfolio models are defined at Security level (see POLICY.PARAMETER for more details about setting up portfolio models) then the user will be prompted whether they wish to generate security orders to bring the portfolio holdings back into line with its model. This will happen when the user leaves the record after running the Enquiry. If there is a variance between portfolio and its model then any orders will be written to the SC.SECURITY.ORDER application.
